The claim can be found on the United Nat: s Fund (Unicef) website, but the webpage is dated 25 April 2003.
The World Health Organisation: WHO) estimated that 435,000 people died from malaria globally in 2017, with the majority of these deaths occurring in the Africa region.
The WHO provides a breakdown of malaria: and in 2017, an estimated 257,076 children under the age of five died from the disease in the Africa region.
